answers.answer: You'll just need to discuss a diet with your Dr. It's not a huge deal. There's tons of diet plans online for pregnant women with GD.

Oh ok..she just told me in the phone that I need to go to diet counseling soon...coz if not they going to give some medicine tablet for that or insulin I dnt want insulin while im pregnant sound scary..it never happened to me before..but I guess it in our family blood line .

question: I didnt pass my 3 hour gloucose test so I have diabetes..what is the best to do now. .this is 1st time to me..I dnt have it in my 1st and second pregnancy.im 27 weeks now with a baby girl im kind of worry..:(
title: 3 hour gloucose test:(
